                           throws java.io.IOException
The main method that parses the different files and stores their input into the different members of this instnace

Parameters:
sFunctionFile - - The path to the sampler-function file
typePropsFile - - The path to the type-properties mapping file
nlGeneratorFile - - The path to the textual (natural-language) input file

java.io.IOException - - In case of I/O problems while trying to open and read the different files

generateRdfGeneratorFile

public void generateRdfGeneratorFile(java.lang.String outputFile)
                              throws java.io.IOException
The second main method (after parseNLGeneratorFiles) which generates the output according to the parsed data

Parameters:
outputFile - - The path to the output file (which comes in addition to the actual updates done on the DB)
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - In case of I/O problems while trying to open and write to the output file
